auth.pleaseLogin: Vui lòng đăng nhập để tiếp tục

header.sheetTitle: Khám phá, Kết nối và Phát triển
header.sheetSubtitle: Hành trình của bạn sẽ bắt đầu từ đây.

introduction.text3: Hành trình của bạn bắt đầu từ đây.
introduction.privacyTerms: Điều khoản bảo mật & Chính sách

login.title: Sign in
login.subtitle: Enter your login information to sign in.
login.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters long
login.passwordInvalid: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character!
login.text1: Connecting with friends and others has never been easier. Eureka brings people closer together.
login.acceptTerms: By clicking Continue, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

register.title: Sign up
register.subtitle: Enter your registration information to sign up.
register.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters long
register.passwordInvalid: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character!
register.acceptTerms: By clicking Continue, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

post.title: Title
post.titleDescription: Your title should be a short description of your post.
post.titleError: Title must be at least 5 and at most 100 characters
post.tagDescription: Choose up to 5 tags to describe what your post is about.
post.tagError: You must choose at least one tag
post.descriptionDescription: Introduce the problem and expand on what your put in the title. Minimum 20 and maximum 2000 characters.
post.descriptionError: Description must be at least 20 and at most 2000 characters
post.createSuccessful: Your post has been created successfully!
post.commentSuccessful: Your comment has been posted successfully!
post.createFailed: An error occurred while creating your post. Please try again later.
post.noOneLiked: No one liked this post yet!
post.noOneDisliked: No one disliked this post yet!
post.actionFailed: An error occurred while processing your action. Please try again later.
